column2: Endeavour Silver Corp. operates as a mineral company. The company is headquartered in Vancouver, British Columbia and currently employs 1,600 full-time employees. The firm is also engaged in exploration activities in Chile. The firm's operating mining segments include Guanacevi, Bolanitos, El Cubo and El Compas, which are located in Mexico, as well as Exploration and Corporate segments. The Exploration segment consists of projects in the exploration and evaluation phases in Mexico and Chile. The firm produces silver-gold from its mines at Guanacevi, Bolanitos, El Cubo and EI Compas in Mexico. The firm conducts its business primarily in Mexico through its subsidiary companies, such as Endeavour Gold Corporation, S.A. de C.V., Minera Plata Adelante S.A. de C.V., Refinadora Plata Guanacevi, S.A. de C.V., Minas Lupycal S.A. de C.V. and MXRT Holdings Inc.
